TextBlock.Text: For a long time, Nomai Clans have been using <color=orange>vessels</color> to explore the universe.
Every ten years, festivals happen where everyone gathers to share knowledge to learn a whole bunch of different things!
...But there hasn't been a lot of transportation innovation since we all use warp cores to move around.

Our <color=orange>vessel</color> is nice and comfy, but I like it when I get to explore the planets we visit! I get bored of seeing the same white and silver colors and not the weird and wacky organic stuff!
So here's my idea: <color=orange>make a space train</color>! It has all the stuff the vessel has, but we get to have home planets in tow!
And we could pick up more planets, or swap them out, anything really! It would be efficient!
So... what do you guys think? Cool idea, right?
